website_summaries.verdict: Versatile highlighter palette that allows you to customize your look.
pros: Buildable metallic formula can be applied wet or dry
Comes in feminine colors that will go with various skin tones
Can be layered or worn separately

website_summaries.verdict: A popular highlighter palette from a well-known beauty brand known for their beaming glow kits.
pros: Features four different metallic shades: a pearl, pink, gold, and duo-chrome pink-lilac
Three shades can also be used on  the lips
Does not contain any parabens, sulfates, or phthalates
Easy to blend and gives an intense highlight
cons: Not every color works on every skin tone

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality, Subtle Highlighter
customer_reviews.text: So if you’re looking for a subtle, every day type of shimmer that lasts all day, this is it! I have a tendency to skip foundation to show off my freckles and the pink on the lower right is awesome to use as a double highlighter and blush. Lasts all day, I love that it isn’t as bold as some of my other highlighters (like the unicorn from Ulta) LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: austenfoster

customer_reviews.title: Product was damaged
customer_reviews.text: The gum drop pad was completely smashed and is not usable. I like the product but was disappointed. It was wrapped in bubble wrap etc. so I do not think it was damaged in transit or the whole compact would have been damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Joan H.

customer_reviews.title: My New Favorite Highlight Kit
customer_reviews.text: The packaging was perfect. The Palette is to dieee for!!! Why do they smell amazing????? I am in Highlighter Heaven!!!! Definitely worth the $40.00
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Kersey

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipstick - But did you change Crush?
customer_reviews.text: I love your lipstick. It stays on all day and does not dry my lips out like other color stay lipsticks. I love the color Crush but it seems you changed this color. I have two Crush colors and one is quite a bit lighter than the other. When did this change?
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Wilkinson

customer_reviews.title: Colors are not the same
customer_reviews.text: I didn't like the colors, they are not as they are shown on the pictures
customer_reviews.author: A. Gavazzoni

customer_reviews.title: 1st one damaged in transit but replaced quickly
customer_reviews.text: love the palette. replacement of the first broken on was swift. would reorder again
customer_reviews.author: GP

customer_reviews.title: arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: 2 of the colors of the palette arrived cracked/broken. the box was in mint condition but the inside was all messed up
customer_reviews.author: Jean Pierre Durand

customer_reviews.title: Sister loved it
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift for my sister. She loved it
customer_reviews.author: Guadalupe

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Makeup came in great condition. Was bubble wrapped and in a protective sleeve. Exactly the product my daughter wanted. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!!! Exactly what I was looking for. Each color is unique.
customer_reviews.author: Deal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Item came as described. Perfectly sealed and wrapped. My daughter loves it! Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Soft
customer_reviews.text: helps with the palette and gives four beautiful color options.
customer_reviews.author: Lor Gron

customer_reviews.title: Go with the maybelline..
customer_reviews.text: It serves its purpose but it’s not necessarily better than some of the cheaper options.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail damaged
customer_reviews.text: I’m so sad. I bought this as a gift for my friend because her kid destroyed hers only for it to come in the mail already ruined. Doesn’t exactly make it a good gift for replacing a destroyed palette.
customer_reviews.author: Elisha Joy Claghorn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for getting it to us in time for the holidays!
customer_reviews.author: KO

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was actually for my granddaughter as a Christmas gift. Will get that feedback from her.
customer_reviews.author: Mt Aukum Pat

customer_reviews.title: No stars but had to give 1 i. order for review to work.
customer_reviews.text: This product - 2nd order was also damaged. I am so upset. Will never order your makeup line again. Now I am the one who has to find a replacement gift and take time out of my schedule to once again go to post offiice and retun.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie Webb

customer_reviews.title: DAMAGE ANASTASIA
customer_reviews.text: Delivered destroyed. Ordered 2 and both were damaged. I hope this doesn’t happen to anyone else. My daughters were very disappointed on Christmas morning
customer_reviews.author: Angela Garcia

customer_reviews.title: My daughter Loves Her Glow Kit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for Christmas. She was very excited and absolutely loves it !
customer_reviews.author: Becky Seger

customer_reviews.title: Very unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and the tan color was shattered. It was expensive for makeup
customer_reviews.author: becky

customer_reviews.title: Broken Makeup
customer_reviews.text: Received product, authentic but 2 of the shades were broken! How do I get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So Blingy and Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This product actually came to me broken, I was so bummed out but I went right onto Amazon and told them about it and asked for another one and it actually came to me within a couple days!! The one that wasn’t broken was so amazing I’m in love!! The colors are perfect for my light complexion and the shine is so perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Came broken
customer_reviews.text: The product is great but there shipping was awful. They don't protect it at all. The top right shade came shattered.
customer_reviews.author: Annie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Glow Kit - Sugar
customer_reviews.text: The colors are deeply pigmented and when applied to your face introduces a beautiful glow! I love this palette and look forward to using daily!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Sousa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: All the colors in the pallet were cracked and unusable.
customer_reviews.author: paul butryn

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous Highlight
customer_reviews.text: Great highlight! I had been wanting this forever and it did not disappoint! The pans are big too so it’ll take forever to use all the product. I love a good popping highlight so if you’re looking for something subtle just use very lightly!
customer_reviews.author: KatieT

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my sister. Came buble wrapped. The packaging is nice. The pigments a very pretty. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I was extremely disappointed to see that one of the pieces was totally shattered. As soon as the plastic film was taken off, pretty much all of the product fell out of that well, getting everywhere! Attached is a photo of the product before the removal of the plastic film. I expected more care to be taken with the packaging and handling of this order and am just very disappointed as the quality was not as expected.
customer_reviews.author: V C.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed! My item came broken. I want my money back
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: The best!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love anastasia products but this one is one of my favorites
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this makeup and it is a reasonal price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makeup broken
customer_reviews.text: I had to return the original item and the replacement because it was for a gift and both arrived broken
customer_reviews.author: Molly F.

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous colors.
customer_reviews.text: I love all the colors; they’re very beautiful. I received mine (from Sephora online) with 2 out of 4 colors broken.☹️ I thought about sending it back, but I just fixed it myself with rubbing alcohol. I wish you could buy each shade seperatly so I could cheaply replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Great product, minor issue
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my daughter and one of the highlighters was slightly cracked. Great product otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: Erica

product_meta.title: Anastasia Beverly Hills Glow Kit, Sugar
product_meta.description: A collection of four metallic powder highlighters for intense luminosity. Layer shades of Anastasia Beverly Hills Glow Kit, or wear them separately, on the face and body for a radiant glow.
feature_bullets: Anastasia Beverly Hills’ all-in-one Sugar Glow Kit contains 4 shades of highlighting powder featuring pink tones and intense luminosity
Shades can be used for highlighting the eyes, face and body
Each shade delivers impressive color payoff and applies easily
The removable magnetic-backed pans make it easy to customize your palette

Anastasia Beverly Hills ensures that all products sold by ‘Anastasia Beverly Hills Inc.’ on Amazon are authentic and meet our high-ingredient and quality standards. Unfortunately, we cannot guarantee the authenticity of products purchased on Amazon from other third-party sellers.
